review: The Stick was really easy to set up.  I was able to up load my pictures and videos. I was able to download the app for the controller.  However I Can only connect to Prime and Netflix.  Having trouble with everything else.
author: Bankable Family

review: Very Slow and i cant access PBS or any of the channels
author: Maged Salib

review: Amazon is trying to take all my money.lol I kid. I prefer the Google Chromecast. Amazon looks awesome but it's mostly for the paid content.
author: Carmen Zeron

review: Great but takes a little while to learn how to navigate. The selection of things that can be are almost limitless! Love it. I recommend this device to everyone!
author: Tab Brown

review: It works good, its small and was easy to install  But I find the remote is touchy,  often takes me not where I want to go. it is also kinda hard to navigate.  I'm sure it will improve with time.
author: R. Kern "Rachelkayz"

review: Hard to understand the tv and movie lineup. After realizing I still needed to join prime, it would still charge me to watch already ran TV shows?  I was hoping to be able to at least watch tv and some movies without a fee. Cannot figure this darn thing out.
author: Debbie Witherow

review: I don't really have cable and I just absolutely love this. I used to just watch things on Netflix so this just gave me some more options.
author: Valeria
